description: Gender and Remittances: Building Gender Responsive Development

subproject.description:
This cross practice and interagency project jointly implemented by UNDP Gender Team, Capacity Development Group, and INSTRAW, aims to enhance gender responsive local development by promoting options in the utilization of remittances for sustainable livelihoods and by building social capital. Research is conducted in Albania, Dominican Republic, Lesotho, Morocco, Philippines and Senegal. 

Funding sources are: $260,000 from Government of Japan (JWIDF), and $55,000 from Core Gender Team funds.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
